casebody.data:
SANTOMASSIMO
v.
VALLEY FORGE LIFE INS. No. 86P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2004. Burley B. Mitchell, Pressly M. Millen, Samuel O. Southern, Raleigh, James G. Exum, Jr., Greensboro, for Valley Forge/CNA Life Ins. Co. Robert B. Cordle, Charlotte, for American Council of Life Ins. L.D. Simmons, II, Corby C. Anderson, Charlotte, for NC Citizens for Business and Industry and the North Carolina Association of Defense Attorneys. Reginald B. Gillespie, Jr., Durham, for Rod N. Santomassimo.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of February 2004 by NC Citizens for Business & Industry for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed As Moot. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of May 2004."
